title: 1895 Mayo Cut Plug  N300  Ed Delehanty plus others

posts.post_title: 1895 Mayo Cut Plug  N300  Ed Delehanty plus others
posts.post_content: Putting a few N300 up for sale---Ed Delehnaty  SGC 50  $4000---Kid Nichols SGC 40  $2200---SGC 40 Wilbert Robinson  $1300---SGC 40 John Clarkson $1300---SGC 10 McCarthy $500---SGC 30 Foutz $250---SGC 40 Kinslow (pitt) $500 and a nice Authentic Hugh Duffy $550---let me know your wantlist, if you are looking for more---Also Scans available---thanks, Don
